@IrishRail many of the people using this service start work at 8am in city centre & miss the Luas services that will get us in on time
@IrishRail can this please be changed back to 7.40 if not earlier as I am late most mornings for work now. Those of us commuting need this
@irishrail since the last timetable change the arrival of the first Carlow train into Heuston has been changed from 7.40 to 7.43
